dialogue.introduction: You're the commander, right? I'm Mikazuki. I hope you welcome me warmly into your fleet.
dialogue.library_intro: I am Mikazuki, the Mutsuki class destroyer that participated in escorting light carriers and other fleets. I even sortied to that fierce battle of Solomon Islands. Although I'm an old model, utilizing my fast speed I even participated in some transport missions.
dialogue.secretary3: Nn... Where in the world are you touching? Jeez...!
dialogue.secretaryidle: Commander, let's have a little rest? Let's not rush things, it's ok like this.
dialogue.secretarymarried: With this, it looks like I'm good to go.
dialogue.wedding: I wanna get more and more strength to help everybody. But, the one I want to help the most is… Commander… Ah, pay it no mind… yeah…
dialogue.show_players_score: It looks like a notice has arrived.
dialogue.equipment1: I have to work much harder...don't I?
dialogue.equipment2: Commander, with this, it looks like I'm good to go.
dialogue.equipment3: With this, it looks like I'm good to go.
dialogue.expedition_selection: With this, it looks like I'm good to go.
dialogue.resource_collection: With this, it looks like I'm good to go.
dialogue.instant_repair: With this, it looks like I'm good to go.
dialogue.development: With this, it looks like I'm good to go.
dialogue.supply: I have to work much harder...don't I?
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Just a little...I'll leave it in their hands...
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: My efforts weren't enough, please excuse me.
dialogue.docking_complete: Ship repairing seems to have been completed.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: It looks like the operation is complete.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: There'll be no defeat. Because this is true battle!
dialogue.night_battle: Jeez, and I even told them not to come again!
dialogue.mvp: To think that I would be that strong...That's unbelievable!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: What have they done!? My clothes have been soiled...!
dialogue.sunk: Commander...I wanted to continue fighting together with you...
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Commander, today is a very special day. This Mikazuki will firmly escort you.
dialogue.fall_event_2015: Leave this to Mikazuki. Let me show you the pride of destroyers!
dialogue.christmas_2015: Christmas, is the Commander enjoying himself too? Here, this is a small gift, but it's filled with gratitude from Mikazuki for what you had been doing... for us.
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: I'm cleaning. Ah, Mocchi, don't just idle around. Nagatsuki, your hands stopped.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Happy New Year! Please take care of me this year too!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Fuu, I'm in middle of transporting beans! I'll distribute these equally to everyone, just wait a moment! Aaah, Mochi, don't eat that yet!
